title: Ryder's Summit
description: High school sweethearts, Ryder Thompson and Becky Duncan, are preparing to embark on separate paths when Becky utters one sentence graduation night that changes everything. “Maybe we should see other people when we’re at school.” They go from exclusive to friends-with-benefits in the blink of an eye as Ryder heads to the basketball courts at the College of Charleston, and Becky moves to the bright lights of Georgia Tech. While Ryder scores points with his play, Becky plays at scoring. When she pushes Ryder away one too many times, Natalie Macey is ready to catch him, except Ryder isn’t sure he’s capable of giving Natalie what she needs.“Guys like him don’t date girls like me.” With Ryder’s encouragement, Natalie decides to see another guy, but a new feeling emerges for Ryder…Jealousy.You never forget your first, but the second time around, you play for keeps.
author: Savannah Maris
